content:
### Enhanced nodes

* [Pipedrive:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.pipedrive.md) Added a feature to fetch data from the Pipedrive API, added Search operation to the Deals resource, and added custom fields option
* [Spotify:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.spotify.md) Added My Data resource
